properties.description: The institution that owns the digital object.
properties.title: Owning institution

properties.description: The institution submitting the digital object for ingest.
properties.title: Submitting institution

properties.description: The name of a logo to display with the object, in addition to the logo of the owning institution.
properties.title: Other logo

properties.description: The type of title.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Any initial article that should not be used for filing or database searches.
properties.title: Non Sort

properties.description: A word, phrase, character, or group of characters that contains the remainder of the title information after the title proper.
properties.title: Subtitle

properties.description: The place a single item holds in a collection or series of works, for example, a volume or series number.
properties.title: Part Number

properties.description: The title of an individual item in a collection or series of works; should not be used for subtitle.
properties.title: Part Name

properties.description: The language of the main title, usually the same language as the text.
properties.title: Language

properties.description: The controlled vocabulary from which the title was taken.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Additional text associated with the element if needed for display purposes. The preferred text with its capitalization should be included, but not delimiters such as colons.
properties.title: Display label

properties.description: Use to link the title to the same title in a different language or script.
properties.title: Alternate Representation Group

properties.description: Use to link the title to the same title in a different language or script.
properties.title: Name/title group

properties.description: The type of identifier. Suggested values include, but are not limited to, those specified in Standard Identifier Source Codes. Use "IID" for local item identifier.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: A unique standard number or code that distinctively identifies the resource.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description: What type of name is recorded.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: A full personal name (when not divided into Family and Given name), full corporate/meeting name,or corporate/meeting name segment.
properties.title: Name Part

properties.description: The given (forename) name segment of a personal name.
properties.title: Given name

properties.description: The family name (surname) segment of a personal name.
properties.title: Family name

properties.description: Title and/or enumeration associated with a name, such as Jr., II, etc.
properties.title: Terms of Address

properties.description: Date(s) associated with a personal name.
properties.title: Dates

properties.description: An organization associated this person at the time that the resource was created.
properties.title: Affiliation

properties.description: Textual role term from MARCRelator terms vocabulary.
properties.title: Role (text)

properties.description: Coded role term from MARCRelator terms vocabulary.
properties.title: Role (code)

properties.description: The controlled vocabulary from which the name was taken.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Use to link the name to the same name in a different language or script.
properties.title: Alternate representation group

properties.description: Use to link a name to a uniform title.
properties.title: Name/title group

properties.description: The general type of content of the original item.
properties.title: Type of Resource

properties.description: The controlled vocabulary from which the genre term was taken. See http://www.loc.gov/standards/sourcelist/genre-form.html for an authority list of sources.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: A place associated with the issuing, publication, release, distribution, manufacture, production, or origin of a resource.
properties.title: Place

properties.description: The entity that published, printed, distributed, released, issued, or produced the resource.
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: The entity that published, printed, distributed, released, issued, or produced the resource.
The date the object was issued. Prefer for formally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source, not the digital version. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date issued

properties.description: Use with single date issued.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: Use with single date issued that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for start of date range.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use with start of date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for end of date range.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with end of date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: The date the object was created. Prefer for born-digital and unpublished or informally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source, not the digital version. Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date created

properties.description: Use for single dates.
properties.title: Date created

properties.description: Use with single dates that are approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for start of a date range.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use with start of date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for end of a date range.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with end of a date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier
Other dates: Copyright, Capture, Valid, Modification, Other

properties.description: The date the resource was copyrighted.
properties.title: Copyright

properties.description: Use for single copyright date.
properties.title: Copyright date

properties.description: Use with single copyright date if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for start of copyright date range.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use with start of copyright date range if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for end of copyright date range.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with end of copyright date range if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for the date(s) on which the resource was digitized or a subsequent snapshot was taken, if different from Date Created or Date Issued.
properties.title: Captured

properties.description: Use for single date captured.
properties.title: Date captured

properties.description: Use with single date captured if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for start of range of capture dates.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use with start of range of capture dates if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for end of range of capture dates.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with end of capture dates if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: The date(s) when the content of the resource is valid.
properties.title: Valid

properties.description: Use for single date valid.
properties.title: Date valid

properties.description: Use with single date valid if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for start of date valid range.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use if start of date valid range is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for end of date valid range.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with end of date valid range if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Date(s) when the resource was modified or changed.
properties.title: Modified

properties.description: Use for a single modification date.
properties.title: Date valid

properties.description: Use with a single modification date if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for the start of a range of modification dates.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use with the start of a range of modification dates if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for the end of a range of modification dates.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with the end of a range of modification dates if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for an unspecified date or date range associated with the resource.
properties.title: Other

properties.description: Use for a single unspecified date.
properties.title: Other date

properties.description: Use with a single unspecified date if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for start of unspecified date range.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use with start of unspecified date range when it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for end of unspecified date range.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with the end of an unspecified date range if it is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.title: Frequency

A statement of the number and specific material of the units of the resource.

properties.title: Digital origin

properties.description: A summary, abstract, scope and content note, or other description.
properties.title: Description

properties.description: A description of the contents of a resource.
properties.title: Table of contents

properties.description: A description of the intellectual level of the audience for which the resource is intended.Use this element whenever there is a specific audience for a resource (for example, a text marked up specifically for historians). Do not use to indicate audiences to whom access or use of the resource is limited; include this information in the <accessCondition> element.
properties.title: Target audience

properties.description: Use for type of note, such as "bibliography", "performers", "thesis", "instrumentation".
properties.title: Type of note

properties.description: Label to be displayed before text of note.
properties.title: Display label

properties.description: Use to describe the components of a compound object.
properties.title: Compound object note

properties.description: The focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Topical subject

properties.title: Alternate representation group

properties.description: The geographic focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Geographic subject

properties.description: Use to link the subject term to the same term in a different language or script.
properties.title: Alternate representation group

properties.description: The temporal focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Temporal subject

properties.description: Use to link the subject term to the same term in a different language or script.
properties.title: Alternate representation group

properties.description: The genre focus of the content of the resource.

properties.description: Antarctica, Australia, Asia, Africa, Europe, North America, or South America.
properties.title: Continent

properties.description: A political entity considered a country.
properties.title: Country

properties.description: First order political divisions called provinces within a country, e.g. in Canada.
properties.title: Province

properties.description: Regions that have status as a jurisdiction, usually incorporating more than one first level jurisdiction.
properties.title: Region

properties.description: First order political divisions called states within a country, e.g. in U.S., Argentina, Italy. Use also for France département.
properties.title: State

properties.description: A geographical area belonging to or under the jurisdiction of a governmental authority.
properties.title: Territory

properties.description: The largest local administrative unit in various countries, e.g. England.
properties.title: County

properties.description: An inhabited place incorporated as a city, town, etc.
properties.title: City

properties.description: A smaller unit within a populated place, e.g., neighborhoods, parks, or streets.
properties.title: City section

properties.description: A tract of land surrounded by water and smaller than a continent but is not itself a separate country.
properties.title: Island

properties.description: A non-jurisdictional geographic entity.
properties.title: Area

properties.description: Any extraterrestrial entity or space, including solar systems, galaxies, star systems, and planets as well as geographic features of individual planets.
properties.title: Extraterrestrial area

properties.description: The ratio between the actual size and a representation of it.
properties.title: Scale

properties.description: The method of representing the surface of a sphere or other shape on a plane.
properties.title: Projection

properties.description: Coordinates covered by the resource
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.description: The occupation reflected in the contents.
properties.title: Occupation

properties.description: The classification scheme used.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: The classification or call number of a resource.
properties.title: Classification

properties.title: Digital origin

properties.description: General information about the use and reproduction of the resource, including links to copyright information pages. For specific restrictions on access (e.g. "Restricted: cannot be viewed until 2010") use the Restriction on Access note.
properties.title: Use and reproduction

properties.description: Specific restriction on access (e.g. "Restricted: cannot be viewed until 2010"). For general information about the use and reproduction of the resource, including links to copyright information pages, use the "Use and reproduction" note.
properties.title: Restriction on Access

properties.description: The institution or repository that holds the resource or where it is available.
properties.title: Physical location

properties.description: Select "PURL" if URL is a PURL. Use "not a PURL" otherwise.
properties.title: Type of URL

properties.description: The URL or PURL of the resource.
properties.title: URL

properties.description: Anchor text to display instead of the URL or PURL.
properties.title: URL display label

properties.description: A public note that will display after the URL or PURL.
properties.title: Note

properties.description: The physical sublocation or collection / subcollection containing the item.
properties.title: Sublocation

properties.description: Information about the metadata record.
properties.title: Record info

properties.description: Designates the rules used for the content of the description, if applicable.
properties.title: Description Standard

properties.description: The code or name of the organization that either created or modified the original record.
properties.title: Content source

properties.description: The date or date and time on which the original MODS record was first created.
properties.title: Creation date

properties.description: The date or date and time the original MODS record was last modified.
properties.title: Change date

properties.description: Contains the system control number assigned by the organization creating, using, or distributing the record.
properties.title: Record identifier

properties.description: Shows the origin or provenance of the MODS record. Use this subelement to record information about the origin, or provenance of the MODS record including what methods were used to prepare the MODS record (machine generated or human prepared) and what transformations have been applied (e.g., the result of converting an existing MARC 21 record to MARCXML and to MODS).
properties.title: Record origin

properties.description: The language of the text of the cataloging in the MODS record.
properties.title: Language information

properties.description: Contains the language(s) of the metadata record.
The language used to catalog the resource.
properties.title: Language of cataloging

properties.description: Whether the language term is code or text.
properties.title: Language term type

properties.description: The authority list from which the term or code was taken.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Contains the scripts(s) of the metadata record.
The script used to catalog the resource.
properties.title: Script of cataloging

properties.description: Whether the script term is code or text.
properties.title: Script term type

properties.description: The authority used for the script code or term.
properties.title: Authority
